bonus.value: When dealing physical damage, increase final damage by 4%/5%/6%/7% and physical damage by an additional 2%/2.5%/3%/3.5% for 3 seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

When equipping 2 or more physical weapons, increase final damage by 15%/17%/19%/21%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

mind.name: Bewitch
mind.desc: Memandu penonton dan diri sendiri ke dalam ilusi sulap dengan sabar dan perlahan.

memory.name: Mystify
memory.desc: Hukum yang paling mendasar adalah "penipuan", "penyesatan", dan "manipulasi". Inilah yang kukatakan pada diriku sendiri sebelum setiap pertunjukan.

belief.name: Beguile
belief.desc: Terkadang "dia" tidak bisa memutuskan apakah akan tidak menyadari atau pura-pura tidak tahu.

emotion.name: Deceive
emotion.desc: Dia harus menipu semua orang, termasuk dirinya sendiri.
